docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: About

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Welcome to Statistics 101, taught by me, Sebastian Thrun and by Adam Sherwin, who is our assistant instructor doing a lot of work in the background. I figure I'll start with giving you a teaser, a challenging teaser. I'm going to provoke you. So, this is you. I believe you should be unhappy, not because our class is so bad, but you and I will prove in a second that you are unpopular. The reason why I show this is to show you how deep statistics is and how we can easily fool ourselves. So let's dive in.
docs.title: Teaser
